name: actions_re-run-workflow-failed-jobs
description: Re-run all of the failed jobs and their dependent jobs in a workflow run using the `id` of the workflow run. You must authenticate using an access token with the `repo` scope to use this endpoint.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

run_id.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

enable_debug_logging.description: Whether to enable debug logging for the re-run.
